author: Ron

review: So far I'm very happy with the Fire TV Stick. I actually have 2 now and I don't see myself swapping them out anytime soon. I've used Roku (1st-3rd Gen), Chromecast and some lesser known/off brand devices. All had their strengths and weaknesses. The Fire TV stick plays the "Big 3" streaming services (many lack Prime Instant Video), and I got it during the pre-order sale for $20. Here's my rundown:Pros:- Playback is smooth- WiFi connection is solid- Remote is easy to use- Good/easy to use Interface- Unbeatable price when on saleCons:- Remote buttons are a little loud when clicking- Doesn't support MHL for power so it needs to be plugged in
